name: HanselandGretel-InteractiveStoryforkids
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hansel and gretel
Developer Terms of Use
des:
From the Twisted Tales library, Hansel & Gretel is an immersive interactive story for kids that lets you – the listener – play the part of Hansel & Gretel OR the Evil Witch, living the stories from their point of view!

Hansel and Gretel have a problem. The narrator of their story is really boring. So they tell him to get on with it! He is rather perturbed by this, characters aren’t supposed to talk back.

Will they resolve their differences? Who really controls the story? What are the possible effects of eating too much gingerbread? And should they visit the incredibly big, ugly, evil ogre who eats children? It’s all up to you.

Did you know there is another story called Red Riding Hood? To find out more check your Alexa app and look for Sonnar.

Twisted Tales include:
* Multiple choices and alternative endings
* Possibility to play story from Hansel & Gretel and Evil Witch point of view
* Professional voice acting
* Immersive music
* Flawless sound effects

FEEDBACK: Please leave us a review if you like our skill.

For more stories please visit search for sonnar interactive in your Alexa app.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
